infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Lat7aati App requires access to your camera to let Capture Pictures to publish your Adds on Lat7aati
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Lat7aati needs to access your camera roll to enable you to choose Pictures for your items
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Lat7aati needs to access your camera roll so that you can upload Pictures to insert your items
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: This permission is not needed by the app, but it is required by an underlying API. If you see this dialog, contact us.
